articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: IISc Study Reveals How a Giant 'Gravity Hole' Formed in the Indian Ocean | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Scientists found that sinking of tectonic plates of an ancient ocean under Africa million of years ago may have generated the plumes under the Indian Ocean.
articles.content:
A team of Indian scientists has identified what caused the giant "gravity hole" covering more than three million square kilometres in the Indian Ocean. 
This gravity hole, known as the Indian Ocean … [+1868 chars]
